name: Scratch
tagline: Playing around with GitHub, SageMath Cloud, Travis-CI and automatic project generation
body:
# Scratch

This page is for my experiments with GitHub, SageMath Cloud, Travis-CI and automatic project generation. Some useful sources of information I used in the process are:

- [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/)
- [Setup LaTeX PDF build using Travis CI](http://harshjv.github.io/blog/setup-latex-pdf-build-using-travis-ci/)
- [Sharing Travis-CI generated files]http://sleepycoders.blogspot.com.au/2013/03/sharing-travis-ci-generated-files.html)
- [Auto-deploying built products to gh-pages with Travis](https://gist.github.com/domenic/ec8b0fc8ab45f39403dd)
- [Automated deployment to GitHub Pages](http://awestruct.org/auto-deploy-to-github-pages/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
